Package org.daisy.dotify.api.translator

Interface TextBorderFactory

  • public interface TextBorderFactory
    Provides a factory for text borders.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String FEATURE_MODE
      Mode feature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Object getFeature​(String key)
      Gets the value for the specified feature key.
      TextBorderStyle newTextBorderStyle()
      Creates a new TextBorderStyle based on the current features.
      void setFeature​(String key, Object value)
      Sets a feature.

    • Field Detail

      • FEATURE_MODE

        static final String FEATURE_MODE
        Mode feature. The corresponding value should be a string.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setFeature

        void setFeature​(String key,
                Object value)
        Sets a feature.
        Parameters:
        key - a feature key
        value - a feature value

      • getFeature

        Object getFeature​(String key)
        Gets the value for the specified feature key.
        Parameters:
        key - the feature key
        Returns:
        returns the feature value, or null if not defined

      • newTextBorderStyle

        TextBorderStyle newTextBorderStyle()
                            throws TextBorderConfigurationException
        Creates a new TextBorderStyle based on the current features.
        Returns:
        a new TextBorderStyle instance
        Throws:
        TextBorderConfigurationException - if no text border could be created based on the currently set features.
